Question & Options:
What roles do the characters play in the context of *Hellboy*?
Options:
A. A) Bruttenholm raised Hellboy.
B. B) Hellboy is overwhelmed by Nimue.
C. C) Nimue kills her coven at Pendleton.
D. D) Pendleton is a character who fights against Hellboy.
Correct Answer: A) Bruttenholm raised Hellboy., B) Hellboy is overwhelmed by Nimue., C) Nimue kills her coven at Pendleton.
